DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine efficacy toxicity cisplatin , paclitaxel , gemcitabine patient progressive unresectable regional metastatic transitional cell carcinoma bladder . - Determine progression free survival patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 8 , cisplatin IV 1 hour paclitaxel IV 3 hour day 1 . Treatment repeat every 3 week 6 course . Patients follow every 3 month disease progression . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 39 patient accrue study within 18 month .
